snippet.title: Hello Kitty Dream Cafe Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Build an enchanting dream cafe with your favorite Sanrio characters! Join the Cafe Challenge in this wonderful FREE cafe simulation game!

.*:+☆Original Cafe Story starring Hello Kitty & Friends☆+:*. 
Join a glorious cafe adventure with Hello Kitty to create the best cafe in town. Compete with Cinnamoroll, Pompompurin, My Melody and more iconic Sanrio characters in a captivating story!

*:+☆Cutest Cutscenes and Unique Cafe Designs☆+:*.
Meet your favorite Sanrio characters in wonderful cutscenes and get enthralled by Sanrio-themed cafes tailor-made for each character.

.*:+☆Over 30 Adorable Sanrio Characters to Unlock☆+:*.
 Hire more than 30 playable Sanrio Characters, each with their own magical skills and special outfits!

.*:+☆40+ Challenging Quests and Events☆+:*. 
Embark on a grand adventure to the top rank of the cafe challenge with more than 40 quests!

.*:+☆Stay Connected & Play with Friends☆+:*. 
Add your friend via Facebook or with a friend code and show off your character!
